content.query:
CREATE VIEW 
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://dlintech001.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/Bank_Churn/geography=Germany/date_of_processing=2025-12-04/part-00000-90df5593-2397-4420-a38d-68be8fadcf51.c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
